pages.text: The Sour Diesel Strain$(br2)Base THC: 19% $(br)Base CBD: 6% $(br)Effect: Haste
Sour Diesel Weed can be obtained by grinding your Fresh or Dried buds in a Grinder machine or using the manual grinder.
Sour Diesel Seeds can be planted on farmland or inside the Grow Pot
Sour Diesel Extract can be gained through the DNA Process or by extracting Sour Diesel Weed in an Extractor
You can package your sour diesel weed for easier distribution or selling to the stoner villager.
